message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.AI 

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of prediction with expert advice, which is a fundamental problem in machine learning and decision theory. The use of geometric stopping time and the development of upper and lower bounds simultaneously suggest that the paper may belong to the Information Theory (cs.IT) or Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The use of probability matching algorithm and the analysis of the optimal adversary suggest that the paper may also belong to the Game Theory (cs.GT) or Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. Finally, the general framework for designing the optimal algorithm and adversary for an arbitrary number of experts suggests that the paper may also belong to the Data Structures (cs.DS) sub-category.
